<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Produce an estimate of the unrolled cost of the specified loop.  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is used to a) produce a cost estimate for partial unrolling and b) to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// cheaply estimate cost for full unrolling when we don&#39;t want to symbolically</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// evaluate all iterations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unrollcostestimator"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unrollcostestimator/#ac4f1a101217a4199902f8bac2cf1afde">UnrollCostEstimator</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> LoopSize;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
